analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/4/0x1beef31946fbbb40b877a72e4ae04a8d1a5cee06.sol:
	Contract Parachute has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/4/0x1beef31946fbbb40b877a72e4ae04a8d1a5cee06.sol#216)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/4/0x1beef31946fbbb40b877a72e4ae04a8d1a5cee06.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_chucks/4/0x1beef31946fbbb40b877a72e4ae04a8d1a5cee06.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/4/0x1beef31946fbbb40b877a72e4ae04a8d1a5cee06.sol#86) is not in mixedCase
